metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3774 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect parsing in url-parse <1.4.3 returns wrong hostname which leads to multiple vulnerabilities such as SSRF, Open Redirect, Bypass Authentication Protocol.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
